name: local-file-search-open
description: Search files on local Windows drive (default D:) by keyword, optionally open the file location in Explorer.

keyword.description: Keyword to search for in file names (case-insensitive).

rootPath.description: Search root folder path. Default: D:\\

maxResults.description: Maximum number of matched files to return. Default: 20

openExplorer.description: If true, open Windows Explorer and select the first matched file. Default: false
